p: In the abandoned distant fields, where the dike structure had been destroyed, the villagers decided to plant mangroves to increase the pace of mud deposition, with the aim of creating new rice fields in the future. The idea came from one elder who had visited the village of Oussouye in Casamance and seen mangroves being planted there. He shared the proposal with the other elders and, from then on, they started to plant mangroves in abandoned fields.
